name: agent-demo
description: A website agent demo using ATXP with Express backend and React frontend

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run server:prod
scripts.client:prod: echo 'In production mode, frontend is served by backend. Use npm start instead.'
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm install
